alert.note: Alert for Lewis; Northern Cayuga; Oswego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 23 at 9:46AM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF OSWEGO...LEWIS...AND NORTHERN CAYUGA COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A band of heavy lake effect snow which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than a quarter of a mile at times. This band of heavy snow is producing heavy snow at the rate of 2 inches per hour in the most intense portion of the band. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 944 AM EST, a band of heavy snow was along a line extending from Oswego to near North Osceola and slowly moving south. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Oswego, Fair Haven Beach State Park, Pulaski, Redfield, Selkirk Shores State Park, Highmarket, Mexico Point State Park, Nine Mile Point, Battle Island State Park, Hastings, Scriba, Richland, Palermo, New Haven, Minetto, Mexico, Williamstown, Orwell, Sandy Creek and Lacona. This includes Interstate 81 between exits 32 and 37. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this band of heavy snow. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
